content: madeline ballet bun cover by tiffany roots materials 1 ball patons silverlash in lustrous lilac approximately 30 yards can substitute any medium worsted weight yarn 1 h crochet hook size 5 00 mm 1 yarn needle to weave in ends 12-18 white sheer ribbon approximately 1/4 wide pattern row 1 chain 4 slip_stitch to make a ring row 2 slip_stitch into ring chain 1 6 single_crochet into ring join to 1st single_crochet row 3 chain 3 double_crochet into same single_crochet 2 double_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 total double crochets including chain 3 as 1st double_crochet row 4 chain 6 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet 10 times chain 3 join with sl to 3rd chain of 1st double_crochet row 5 slip_stitch into next chain-3 space chain 2 half_double_crochet chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 1 11 times chain 1 join with slip_stitch to top of 1st half_double_crochet row 6 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet around join to 1st half_double_crochet 23 half_double_crochet row 7-9 repeat row 6 row 10 chain 5 skip next half_double_crochet double_crochet into next double_crochet chain 2 skip next double_crochet double_crochet in next half_double_crochet chain 2 around join to 3rd chain of 1st double_crochet finish off cut a ribbon of your choice approximately 12-18 inches long weave through row 10 this will be the tie for the bun cover enjoy © 2006 tiffany roots www tiffcrochets com
